name: Ed in the Shed
description:
The not-zombie apocalypse might be yesterday's news, but Sean's life is the same balancing act as ever.

Developed for Movie Jam, based on the final scene of Shaun of the Dead.

How To Play

Keep Elizabeth and Ed's stats from falling to zero by spending time with them, and feeding them tea/meat respectively. Tea takes time to boil and meat has to be thawed out (click on the kettle and freezer to start those processes).

Try to keep everybody happy until 2PM, then you can head down the Mended Gun for a roast!

Credits

Title/intro music - "The Blue Wrath", by I Monster, arranged by me in beepbox.

Game/game over music - Based on "Everybody's Happy Nowadays" by The Buzzcocks, arranged by me in beepbox

Fonts - m5x7 by Daniel Linssen, 04B_03B by Yuji Oshimoto, M12 Mach Biker by Miffies, Mecha Bold by CaptainFalcon

Everything else - Me! Check out my website for various ways to keep track of what I'm up to.
